privacyprograms: The Arizona Cardinals Football Club has been awarded TRUSTe's Privacy Seal signifying that this privacy policy and practices have been reviewed by TRUSTe for compliance with TRUSTe's program requirements  including transparency, accountability and choice regarding the collection and use of your personal information. The TRUSTe program covers information collected through this Web site, www.azcardinals.com. TRUSTe's mission, as an independent third party, is to accelerate online trust among consumers and organizations globally through its leading privacy trustmark and innovative trust solutions.
recoursemech: If you have questions or complaints regarding our privacy policy or practices, please contact us at (602) 379-0101.  If you are not satisfied with our response you can contact TRUSTe at https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request.
